properties.name: facereco.engine.extract.url
properties.description: URL or IP Address of Image Extraction engine server

properties.name: facereco.engine.extract.port
properties.description: Port of Image Extraction engine server

properties.name: facereco.engine.ident.url
properties.description: URL or IP Address of Image Identification engine server

properties.description: Port of Image Identification engine server

properties.name: facereco.engine.max-timeout
properties.description: Face recognition engine request maximum timeout in second.
